name: Froslass
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: It freezes prey by blowing its -58 degrees F breath. It is said to then secretly display its prey.

abilities.name: Cursed Glare
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can’t attach any Special Energy cards from his or her hand to his or her Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
